products.name: Chocolate Chip
products.description: Vanilla cookie with chocolate chips and a secret ingredient that makes them extra soft.

products.name: Snickerdoodles
products.description: A tangy vanilla cookie with a cinnamon sugar coating.

products.name: Cheese
products.description: Kate Bakes cheese bread is a yeast based bread made with shredded cheddar cheese. Baked in a bread pot that gives the bread a fluffy soft texture.

products.name: Oatmeal
products.description: A fluffy yeast bread made with ground oatmeal and honey. Made in a bread pot. Great for sandwiches!!

products.name: Lemon Blueberry
products.description: A soft lemon cupcake with fresh lemon juice and blueberries mixed in. Cupcake is topped with lemon buttercream frosting and blueberry garnish.

products.name: Chocolate Bourbon
products.description: Bourbon and chocolate mixed together to give this cupcake a dense texture and a boozy taste. Chocolate bourbon buttercream tops this cupcake.

products.name: Lemon Blueberry
products.description: A traditional scone with flavors of fresh lemon and blueberries mixed in and topped with a glaze.

products.name: Cinnamon Chip
products.description: A scone mixed with cinnamon chips topped with a light powdered sugar glaze. So much better than a cinnamon roll!

products.name: Kieflie
products.description: A crescent shaped 'roll cookie' filled with a walnut and egg white mixture. Finished with a roll in powdered sugar.

products.name: Decorated Sugar
products.description: Traditional sugar cookie cut outs decorated with royal icing. Desgins can range from snowflakes to snowmen to helper elves.

products.name: Gingerbread
products.description: Cinnamon and ginger incorporated into a short bread cookie. Decorated in Royal icing.

products.name: Kolach
products.description: A traditional hungarian pastry. Similar to a flat rolled croissant filled with apricot jam. Also known as baby Jesus in a blanket cookie.

products.name: Butter Spritz
products.description: A small cookie with a rich buttery flavor and a hint of vanilla. Cookies are made in a cookie press and come in a bag of a dozen.

products.name: Peppermint Bark
products.description: A thin candy made with dark chocolate and chunks of candy cane. Served broken up in pieces of 'bark' similar to a peanut brittle.

products.name: Cranberry Delight Bars
products.description: A vanilla blondie with dried cranberries, white chocolate chips with a cream cheese frosting.

products.name: Pizzelles
products.description: A thin Italian cookie with hints of orange flavoring made in a special decorative waffle iron. Perfect for dunking in hot chocolate or coffee.

products.name: Fruit Cake
products.description: Candied fruit mixed in a spiced cake cupcake.

products.name: Hot Chocolate
products.description: Chocolate Cupcake made with homemade hot chocolate. Topped with a whipped buttercream frosting.

products.name: Nut Roll Wreath
products.description: Traditional sweet bread rolled in a vanilla nut filling, shaped as a wreath for the season.

products.name: Orange Cranberry Cinnamon
products.description: Traditional scone flavored with orange zest, craisins and an orange glaze.

products.name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Blondies
products.description: A vanilla brownie flavored with peanut butter, peanuts and chocolate chips.

products.name: Butter Spritz
products.description: A small buttery cookie flavored with hints of vanilla. Made in a unique cookie press.

products.name: Chocolate
products.description: A chocolate cake with chopped walnuts, coffee liqueur and rolled in powdered sugar.

products.name: Box of Cookies
sizes: Choice of 4 types of cookies (16 total)
products.description: You pick! Choose up to four different types of cookies from our Christmas cookies selection. Four of each cookie, 16 in total.

products.name: Christmas Tea in a box
products.description: Half a dozen of two different cookies, a teacup, holiday tea, and a small jar of lemon curd. A perfect care package for the holidays!

products.name: Bake o gram
products.description: 2 different types of cookies and a mug. Served with a jar of hot chocolate mix.
